index.md.L'application mobile Jeedom nécessite l': The Jeedom mobile application requires the installation of this plugin so that the box can communicate with the Mobile application

index.md.En cliquant sur un plugin, vous pouvez l: By clicking on a plugin, you can authorize it or not to chat with the mobile application, and configure each of the generic types associated with its commands
index.md.En cliquant sur une pièce, vous pouvez l: By clicking on a part, you can authorize it or not to be present in the mobile application, and configure each of the generic types associated with its orders

index.md.Au 1er lancement de l'application Mobile: When you launch the Mobile application for the first time, you will be offered a tutorial to help you configure it

index.md.Dans ce cas, l'application va récupérer: In this case, the application will automatically recover all the configuration of your Jeedom and connect automatically
index.md.Lorsqu'il sera connecté chez vous en Wif: When it is connected to your home via Wifi, the application will automatically use the Jeedom ethernet address internal to your network
index.md.Lorsque vous serez connecté en 4G ou 3G,: When you are connected in 4G or 3G, it will use your external address to connect to your Jeedom (for example via the Jeedom DNS service if you use it
index.md.Si vous optez pour la configuration manu: If you choose manual configuration, in this case you will need to manually enter the internal and external IP addresses of your Jeedom
